method: Cook the bow tie pasta according to package instructions.
In a large skillet, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat.
Add the minced garlic and diced onion to the skillet, sauté until fragrant.
Add the sliced bell pepper, julienned carrot, and sugar snap peas to the skillet.
In a small bowl, mix together the soy sauce, sriracha sauce, hoisin sauce, and sesame oil.
Pour the sauce over the vegetables and stir to coat.
Add the cooked bow tie pasta to the skillet and toss to combine.
Continue to stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes, until everything is well mixed and heated through.
Serve hot and enjoy the spicy kick of this flavorful stir-fry!
